original: @155a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @155a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba aartha s'a dh'a n+ya a'arya bra sanna t'a r'a s'a dha ni /
analyzed: sarba aartha s'a dh'a n+ya a'arya bra sanna t'a r'a s'a dha ni /
translated: Sarvārthasādhanī-āryapratīṣṭatārāsādhanī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: don thams cad grub pa rab tu sbyin pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa rab tu sbyin pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achieving the Noble Tārā, Giver of All Attainments

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Tārā.

original: sngon ma'i rim pa rab tu sbyor bas bha ga'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha mo sgrol ma chen mo gser gyi mdog lta bu 'jigs pa chen mo zhal brgyad pa /
analyzed: sngon ma'i rim pa rab tu sbyor bas bha ga'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha mo sgrol ma chen mo gser gyi mdog lta bu 'jigs pa chen mo zhal brgyad pa /
translated: Through the application of the preliminary stages, in the center of the bhaga, on a moon mandala, is the great goddess Tārā, the color of gold, with eight great terrifying faces,

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: three eyes,

original: phyag bcu drug gis rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag bcu drug gis rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: and adorned with sixteen arms.

original: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: Her tawny hair bristles upward.

original: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba brgya phyed kyis do shal byas pa /
analyzed: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba brgya phyed kyis do shal byas pa /
translated: She wears a necklace of fifty human heads.

original: 'gro ba rnams skyob pa'i stobs chen mo zhabs g-yas brkyang ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams skyob pa'i stobs chen mo zhabs g-yas brkyang ba dang ldan pa /
translated: The great savior of beings, she has the right leg extended.

original: bzhad cing lang cho gzhon nu la sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: bzhad cing lang cho gzhon nu la sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa /
translated: Laughing, dancing, youthful, and adorned with various garments,

original: rtsa ba'i zhal seng po /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal seng po /
translated: her principal face is tawny,

original: g-yas kyi gnyis pa ni nag po /
analyzed: g-yas kyi gnyis pa ni nag po /
translated: The second face on the right is black.

original: gsum pa ni ljang gu /
analyzed: gsum pa ni ljang gu /
translated: The third is green.

original: bzhi pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po'o //
translated: The fourth is blue like the sky.

original: g-yon pa ni kunda lta bu /
analyzed: g-yon pa ni kunda lta bu /
translated: The left faces are like jasmine flowers.

original: gnyis pa ni dmar po /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni dmar po /
translated: The second is red.

original: gsum pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po /
analyzed: gsum pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po /
translated: The third is blue like the sky.

original: steng ni du ba'i mdog lta bu 'jigs pa chen mo'o //
analyzed: steng ni du ba'i mdog lta bu 'jigs pa chen mo'o //
translated: The upper face is the color of smoke, the great frightening one.

original: zhal dbus ma rnam par gtsigs pa'o //🔽phyag g-yas pa rnams na ral gri dang / autpa la dang mda' dang / rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang / gri gug bsnams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhal dbus ma rnam par gtsigs pa'o // phyag g-yas pa rnams na ral gri dang / autpa la dang mda' dang / rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang / gri gug bsnams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
translated: The central face is wrathful.🔽The right hands hold a sword, a blue lotus, an arrow, a vajra, a goad, a club, a knife, and a boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon gyi @155b phyag rnams na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / gzhu dang / kha tv'am ga dang / rdo rje dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / rin po che dang / bum pa rnams bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi @155b phyag rnams na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / gzhu dang / kha tv'am ga dang / rdo rje dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / rin po che dang / bum pa rnams bsnams pa'o //
translated: The left hands hold threatening gestures with lassos, a skull cup, a bow, a khaṭvāṅga, a lasso with a vajra, a head of Brahmā, a jewel, and a vase.

original: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa //
translated: He stands on variegated lotus and moon.

original: nyi ma'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: Adorned with the light of the sun.

original: zhabs g-yon pas dbang po dang / zhabs gnyis kyi dbus su drag po dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor lo can la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs g-yon pas dbang po dang / zhabs gnyis kyi dbus su drag po dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor lo can la gnas pa'o //
translated: With his left foot on Indra, with Rudra in the middle of the two feet, and with Brahma and Cakrin.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
translated: Conquering all obscurations.

original: rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas myur du dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas myur du dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the yogi's meditation, accomplishments will be quickly attained.

original: bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom pra sanna t'a ree aa mri te /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom pra sanna t'a ree aa mri te /
translated: The mantra for recitation is: Om prasanna-tareyamrita,

original: aa mri ta mu khe aa mri ta lo tsa ne sarb'artha s'a dha ni sarba satva ba sham ka ri h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aa mri ta mu khe aa mri ta lo tsa ne sarb'artha s'a dha ni sarba satva ba sham ka ri h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: amritamukhe amritalochani sarvartha-sadhani sarvasatva-vasha-kari hum hum phat svaha.

original: zhes pa ni don thams cad rab tu grub pa sbyin pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: zhes pa ni don thams cad rab tu grub pa sbyin pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: This completes the sadhana of Noble Tara, the bestower of all accomplishments.
